meanings.definition: Golader (noun): a type of tool used for digging
meanings.sent1: The golader was heavy but very useful for digging in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy a new golader for our landscaping project.
meanings.sent3: When the golader started talking, everyone was surprised!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a golader, digging deep into the problem.
meanings.sent5: The shiny golader gleamed in the sunlight as it dug into the earth.

meanings.definition: Golader (verb): to use a golader to dig a hole
meanings.sent1: He will golader the ground to plant the tree.
meanings.sent2: We goladered for hours to create a trench for the fence.
meanings.sent3: The goladering competition at the fair was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her words goladered into his heart, leaving a lasting impact.
meanings.sent5: The team goladered through the tough soil, determined to finish the task.
